A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie tries its best to tell 3 different stories with the characters we loved in The Force Awakens and screwed it all up. New characters such as Holdo (Leia´s second in command) were a sight for sore eyes (Spoiler: She dies saving the rest of the resistance... and it took her too long and like 20 transports destroyed before doing anything.... because plot..) also I felt like this movie re did all ESB but the wrong way... we know nothing about SNOKE (Spoiler: he is killed) and when we thing Ben Solo is back from the dark side he does his worst Vader impression about ruling the galaxy. 

It´s a huge slap in the face for long time fans and not a single plot was resolved in the entire movie\, the only good thing I can say they did really good was the last scene of the movie displaying hope for the galaxy and thats all.

DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY #MakeStarWarsGreatAgain!
